message.content:
{"id": "17993", "title": "Bug 17993: Find/Replace shouldn't replace typed entry with value from history", "description": "It would be better if what I type isn't replaced with a value from the history. The current behavior seems to be similar to autocomplete which is particularly common in browsers. In the future, perhaps, a full autocomplete feature could be provided.", "OB": "When using the Find/Replace feature in the document, the typed entry is being replaced with a value from the history.", "EB": "The behavior of the Find/Replace feature should be changed to something more simple which allows the full range of find and replace operations to be performed. The feature should respect the case of what the user types. Until then, the feature should be removed.", "SR": "To reproduce:\
1. Open a document.\
2. Select Edit -> Find/Replace.\
3. The typed entry should not be replaced with a value from the history.\
4. The behavior should be the same for the 'Replace With' field."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '17993', 'title': "Bug 17993Find/Replace shouldn't replace typed entry with value from history", 'description': 'It wouldbe better if what I type isn\'t replaced with a value from the history.The current behaviour seems to be similar to "autocomplete" which isparticularly common in browsers. In the future, perhaps, a full "autocomplete"feature could be provided. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "Bug 17993Find/Replace shouldn't replace typed entry with value from history For me, it isvery common to perform operations like this.I think the current behaviour to be changed to something more simple whichallows the full range of find and replace operations to be performed. But this should still respect the case of what theuser types. Until then, I think the feature should be removed.To reproduce: Open a document so that EditFind/Replace... becomes available. You shouldn't be able to.The behaviour is similar for the Replace With field. ", 'SR': ''}
